Attributes.description: Theoretical and applied issues in statistics and econometrics. Statistical distributions, sampling theory, maximum likelihood methods of estimation and hypothesis testing, generalized least squares, measurement errors, non-normal errors, systems of equations, discrete-choice models, outliers, regression diagnostics, and model selection.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of ECON 325, ECON 327 and one of ECON 326, ECON 328.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 9:00, End Time: 10:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: A203
